no_valid_api.synonym:
The A P I key that you entered is not valid
  Refer to the read me file for instructions on how to obtain one

no_info_general.synonym: I'm sorry, I can not find the list you are looking for right now; please ask again later

no_info.synonym:
I'm sorry
  I can not find any information on the (film|movie) {movie}

no_api.synonym: You must enter your T M D B  A P I key at home dot mycroft dot A I to use the movie master skill

movie_top.synonym:
These are the (top|most popular) movies (out|playing) now; {toplist}
{toplist} are the (top|most popular) movies (out|playing) now

movie_runtime.synonym:
The (movie|film|flick) {movie}, runs for {runtime} minutes

The (movie|film|flick) {movie} is {runtime} minutes long

Watching {movie}; You can expect about {runtime} minutes before you can have a bathroom break

movie_recommendations.synonym:
I recommend the movies {movielist}, if you like the (movie|flick) {movie}
The movies {movielist} are a good choice if you like the (movie|flick) {movie}

movie_production_single.synonym: The production company {company}, produced the movie {movie}

movie_production_multiple.synonym:
The companies {companies} and {lastcompany} produced the movie {movie}
{companies} and {lastcompany} produced the movie {movie}

movie_popular.synonym:
The new popular movies out now are {popularlist}

{popularlist} top the movie charts right now

movie_info_response.synonym: {movie} was released on {year}, with a budget of {budget} dollars

movie_genre_single.synonym:
The (movie|film) {movie} could be considered a {genre}
You can find the (film|flick) {movie} in the {genre} section

movie_genre_multiple.synonym:
The (movie|film|flick) can be found in one of the genres; {genrelist} and {genrelistlast}
People consider the (movie|film) a {genrelist} or {genrelistlast}

movie_description.synonym:
the (movie|film) {movie} is about this

here is a synopsis of the (movie|film) {movie}

movie_cast.synonym:
Here is the cast of {movie}; {actorlist} and {lastactor}
The following people (star|play|act) in the movie {movie}; {actorlist} and {lastactor}

genre_tv_search.synonym: the (television|TV) shows with the genre {genre} are;

genre_movie_search.synonym: the movies with the genre {genre} are;

fallback_api.synonym: Falling back to the default A P I

bad_tv_genre_catagory.synonym: I can not find any (TV|television) shows with the genre {genre}
